summary: Completed testing of updated utility app batch features: QR Generator batch generation with is.gd, Shortlinks batch creation with is.gd, and WebP image conversion. Backend APIs work perfectly (100% success), frontend has minor QR result display issue but shortlinks batch functionality working excellently.

ui_bugs.issue: QR code results not displaying in frontend after generation (timeout waiting for results)
ui_bugs.note: API returns correct data with 200 OK, frontend rendering issue

passed_tests: Backend QR Generator batch API with is.gd integration (multiple content types: URL, email, text, WiFi)
Backend Shortlinks batch creation API with is.gd integration (multiple URLs)
Backend Image Converter WebP API with 75% quality
Frontend QR Generator page loads with batch functionality (3 QR items, type selection, is.gd toggle)
Frontend Shortlinks batch functionality (multiple URLs input, is.gd integration, results display)
Frontend Image Converter page loads correctly (drag & drop interface)
is.gd API integration working for both QR and Shortlinks (URL shortening confirmed)
QR Generator color customization and size controls
Shortlinks copy functionality and provider badges (is.gd vs local)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (24/24 API tests passed including new batch features)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (QR result display issue, shortlinks batch working perfectly)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix QR Generator frontend results display - API is working correctly and returning proper data, but results are not rendering in the UI. Check React component state management and result handling in QRGenerator.jsx around line 85-86 where setResults() is called.
